description: This file defines the main app entry point for a Flutter application, including the root widget, theme setup, routing, and a bottom navigation scaffold with four main tabs (Home, Matches, Chat, Profile). It also includes a minimal homepage widget used for testing purposes.

classes.name: MyApp
classes.description: Root widget of the app that sets up theme, routing, and state management using Provider.

classes.name: MyHomePage
classes.description: A simple widget displaying a message indicating the app is being generated, used mainly for testing.

classes.name: RootTabScaffold
classes.description: Stateful widget providing bottom navigation with four main tabs and animated switching between them.

methods.name: build
methods.description: Build method for each widget class, constructing the respective UI components.

methods.name: _RootTabScaffoldState.build
methods.description: Build method for the bottom navigation scaffold, managing tab switching and UI layout.
